response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, it's worth noting that the product is worth $10,000 to you based on our market research. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire it at a special introductory price of $9,500. This offer is exclusive to you and includes a comprehensive warranty and personalized support. I hope we can discuss further how this product can benefit you and your needs. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 9500}
